programCommand: uk.ac.sanger.npg.picard.AlignmentFilter INPUT_ALIGNMENT=[testdata/bam/chimeric.sam] OUTPUT_ALIGNMENT=[testdata/chimeric/chimeric.bam] OUTPUT_UNALIGNED=testdata/chimeric/chimeric_unaligned.bam METRICS_FILE=testdata/chimeric/chimeric.json TMP_DIR=[testdata/chimeric] VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=SILENT    VERBOSITY=INFO QUIET=false COMPRESSION_LEVEL=5 MAX_RECORDS_IN_RAM=500000 CREATE_INDEX=false CREATE_MD5_FILE=false
